rationale: 'highly contagious' is a technical term, not an authorial intensifier on a general risk-adjective.
statement_text: Nearly 1 million chickens on a Minnesota egg farm will be slaughtered to help limit the spread of the highly contagious bird flu after it was confirmed there, officials said Monday.
